mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE (com_id,pla_no, pla_name, pla_address, pla_phone, pla_money, pla_time, pla_statue,pla_start, pla_end, pla_people ) VALUES(#{com_id},seq_pla_no.nextval, #{pla_name},#{pla_address},#{pla_phone},#{pla_money},#{pla_time},#{pla_statue},#{pla_start},#{pla_end},#{pla_people})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLACE order by pla_no
SELECT pla_no,pla_name,pla_address,pla_phone,pla_money,pla_time, pla_statue,pla_start, pla_end, pla_people FROM PLACE WHERE PLA_NO = #{pla_no}
